article:
Do you have a beautiful dream? I know everyone _ their own dreams in their life. The dreams are very _ to them. The dreams can make them work harder.
I am studying in a school now. My dream is to be a _ in West China. Many children there want to go to school _ they can't. Their families are very _ and the parents don't have any money to let their children go to school. I think going to school and studying hard is the only _ to change their life.
Those places need teachers greatly. So I want to be a teacher to help them. I will be kind to my students and make friends _ them. I will give them love and teach them _ to be a useful person. I think it is a(n) _ job in the world. I hope I will realize  my dream!
